title: He Became a Billionaire By Thinking Like This
itunes:title: He Became a Billionaire By Thinking Like This
description:
In this episode, I talk about why it is so important to think outside the box and also share a story about how thinking outside of the box made this man a billionaire.

Follow me on IG for more inspiration: https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/

Thanks to today's sponsor Netsuite: http://netsuite.com/dial
